price: Those who abuse believing men and women[49] for something they did not commit, will bear the burden of slander and flagrant sin.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ يُؤۡذُونَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَٰتِ بِغَيۡرِ مَا ٱكۡتَسَبُواْ فَقَدِ ٱحۡتَمَلُواْ بُهۡتَٰنٗا وَإِثۡمٗا مُّبِينٗا
footnotes: [49] By physically harming them or falsely accusing them.
